SEARCH
Package com.platform.payment.api

Interface PaymentManagementService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PaymentManagementServiceImpl
public interface PaymentManagementService
Service interface for payment management operations. This interface provides the API layer with access to payment functionality without depending on internal implementation details.

  • Method Details

    • createPayment

      PaymentDto.PaymentResponse createPayment(UUID organizationId, BigDecimal amount, String currency, String paymentMethodId, String description, boolean confirm) throws com.stripe.exception.StripeException
      Creates a payment intent.
      Parameters:
      organizationId - the organization ID
      amount - the payment amount
      currency - the payment currency
      paymentMethodId - the payment method ID (optional)
      description - the payment description
      confirm - whether to confirm the payment immediately
      Returns:
      the created payment
      Throws:
      com.stripe.exception.StripeException - if Stripe operation fails

    • createPaymentIntent

      PaymentDto.PaymentIntentResponse createPaymentIntent(PaymentDto.CreatePaymentIntentRequest request) throws com.stripe.exception.StripeException
      Creates a Stripe payment intent.
      Parameters:
      request - the payment intent request payload
      Returns:
      payment intent details
      Throws:
      com.stripe.exception.StripeException - if Stripe operation fails

    • confirmPaymentIntent

      PaymentDto.PaymentIntentResponse confirmPaymentIntent(UUID organizationId, String paymentIntentId, PaymentDto.ConfirmPaymentIntentRequest request) throws com.stripe.exception.StripeException
      Confirms a Stripe payment intent.
      Parameters:
      organizationId - the organization ID
      paymentIntentId - the payment intent ID
      request - the confirm request payload
      Returns:
      payment intent details after confirmation
      Throws:
      com.stripe.exception.StripeException - if Stripe operation fails

    • cancelPaymentIntent

      Parameters:

      paymentIntentId - the payment intent ID
      Returns:
      payment intent details after cancellation
      Throws:
      com.stripe.exception.StripeException - if Stripe operation fails

      Returns:

      paymentMethodId - the payment method ID
      displayName - the new display name
      billingDetails - the new billing details
